name: Deep In The Dark
description:
This game was made for Weekly Game Jam - Week 148 and the theme was "MIRROR". I joined a bit late but I'm glad that I did. This theme helped me in getting a great idea.

You will be controlling a character who has a mysterious power. He can use two mirror like gadgets which helps him to get reflected on to the other side horizontally or vertically. As he cannot jump at all, he must rely on his super gadgets!

Controls:

Left/Right Arrow - Movement 

Down Arrow - Toggle Upside down(You cannot get reflected vertically unless the character stands upside down)

Space- Get reflected to the other side

Z- Toggle using Horizontal Mirror

X- Toggle using Vertical Mirror

R- Restart

Can you finish all the stages?

This game is still in its initial stage, so I'd appreciate if you give me a review on it. If you find any bugs, please let me know.

Thank you.

Character assets are made by HaveDream
